description: Verify that the Sign Up page loads correctly when accessing the /auth/signup URL
scenario: New user navigates to the signup page to create a Phalanx Cyber Academy account
expected_results: Display the complete signup page with multi-step form, cybersecurity theme, and proper initialization
procedure:
1. Open web browser
2. Navigate to http://localhost:5000/auth/signup
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check page title displays 'Join Phalanx Cyber Academy'
5. Verify multi-step signup form is visible and properly styled
6. Check JavaScript components initialize correctly

description: Verify Step 2 password creation with strength checking and validation
scenario: User creates secure password with real-time strength feedback
expected_results: Display password fields with strength meter, validation feedback, and confirmation matching
procedure:
1. Navigate to Step 2 of signup form
2. Verify 'Agent Password' field with key icon
3. Check 'Confirm Password' field is present
4. Verify password strength checker initializes with cybersecurity theme
5. Test real-time password strength meter updates
6. Check password validation rules (length, uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special chars)
7. Verify password confirmation matching validation
8. Test user input integration for strength checking
9. Check custom styling classes for strength meter

description: Verify signup page is responsive across different screen sizes
scenario: User accesses signup page on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices
expected_results: Page adapts properly to different screen sizes while maintaining multi-step functionality
procedure:
1. Navigate to /auth/signup page on desktop (1920x1080)
2. Verify max-width constraint (max-w-2xl) works properly
3. Resize browser to tablet size (768px width)
4. Check form scaling and step indicator layout
5. Resize to mobile size (375px width)
6. Verify multi-step form remains usable on mobile
7. Test touch interactions for step navigation
8. Check button sizes meet touch target guidelines
9. Verify password strength meter responsiveness
10. Test landscape and portrait orientations on mobile

description: Verify signup page performance and integration with system components
scenario: User completes signup process with optimal performance and proper system integration
expected_results: Fast loading times, smooth interactions, and seamless integration with email verification system
procedure:
1. Clear browser cache and navigate to /auth/signup page
2. Record page load time and performance metrics
3. Verify total load time is under 3 seconds
4. Test JavaScript component initialization time
5. Check password strength calculations performance
6. Verify form submission response time
7. Test integration with email verification system
8. Check database transaction performance
9. Verify redirect to verification pending page
10. Test overall user experience flow timing
11. Check memory usage and cleanup
12. Verify no memory leaks in step transitions

description: Verify cyber-themed notification system for user feedback
scenario: User receives various notifications during signup process
expected_results: Notifications display with proper styling, timing, and cyber theme
procedure:
1. Trigger validation error and observe error notification
2. Verify notification appears in top-right with red styling
3. Complete a step successfully and check success notification
4. Test info notification for account creation process
5. Verify notification auto-removal after 4 seconds
6. Check notification icons match message type
7. Test notification styling in dark mode
8. Verify multiple notifications stack properly
